text: Ne nibakhwitsila balia abasuubilanga tsinyaali tsiefu, baboolele mbu; â€œomulembe kube ninenyu, Nyasaye wenyu yelachila tsimbabaasi, mbu ulia ulakhola mwinywe amabii khubusilu(obulamanya) mana asabe eshileshelo, mana akhole amalayi, mbu Nyasaye alamuleshela, toto ye ni weshileshelo, Owetsimbabaasi muno
